articles.title: CNN reporter: I have never seen anything like this
articles.description: The CDC on Monday abruptly reverted to its previous guidance about how coronavirus is transmitted, removing language about airborne transmission it had posted just days earlier. CNN's Elizabeth Cohen tells us more.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

articles.title: Opinion: What happens when Harris' and Pence's masks come off
articles.description: CNN Opinion asks commentators to share their tweets and thoughts on the vice presidential debate in real time.

articles.author: Dell Cameron
articles.title: Trump Spox Matt Wolking Shoves Foot in Mouth While Bashing CNN, Gizmodo Reporters
articles.description: The Justice Department released—and later retracted—a statement on Thursday saying it had opened an inquiry into the discarding of nine military ballots cast for President Trump in Luzerne County, Pennsylvania. The notice disappeared from the DOJ’s website ho…

articles.title: Analyst: Double standards define Trump administration
articles.description: CNN national security analyst Samantha Vinograd weighs in on President Trump's unfounded attacks on mail-in voting and refusal to commit to a peaceful transition of power.

articles.title: CNN analyst: This is the angriest I've ever been on TV
articles.description: CNN national security analyst Samantha Vinograd breaks down how President Donald Trump's positive Covid-19 diagnosis is a risk to national security.

articles.title: Hurricane Delta strengthens to major Category 3 storm
articles.description: The National Hurricane Center says Hurricane Delta is now a major Category 3 storm. CNN meteorologist Tyler Mauldin has the latest forecast.

articles.title: Catching up with Mikaela Shiffrin
articles.description: Double Olympic gold medalist Mikaela Shiffrin chats to CNN about Covid-19 and the unexpected and tragic loss of her father earlier this year.

articles.title: Why a Covid-19 surge is likely this fall and winter
articles.description: Experts say Covid-19 cases will likely increase in the winter months. CNN Medical Analyst Dr. Leana Wen explains why and how you can prepare and stay safe.

articles.title: 'Manipulated by Trump': Carl Bernstein on NBC town hall
articles.description: CNN political analyst Carl Bernstein reacts to NBC hosting President Trump's town hall at the same time ABC is scheduled to host Joe Biden's television event.

articles.title: Fire danger from the Plains to the Pacific
articles.description: From California to Texas, record heat, strong winds and extreme drought cause wildfire worries for millions. CNN Meteorologist Karen Maginnis has the details.

articles.author: Tom McKay
articles.title: Every Top U.S. Military Commander But the Marine Corps, Coast Guard Guys Now in Quarantine
articles.description: All but one of the Joint Chiefs of Staff is in quarantine after the vice commandant of the U.S. Coast Guard tested positive for the novel coronavirus on Monday, CNN reports.Read more...
articles.content:

articles.title: Former Trump Campaign Manager Brad Parscale in Hospital After Apparent Suicide Attempt: Report
articles.description: Brad Parscale, the Republican digital strategist recently demoted from his role as Donald Trump’s campaign manager, is in the hospital following what Florida authorities described as a suicide attempt, CNN reported on Monday.Read more...

articles.title: Vinograd: This may be the most dangerous moment the US government has ever faced
articles.description: CNN national security analyst Samantha Vinograd and Don Lemon discuss the impact of President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump's testing positive for Covid-19.

articles.author: Elizabeth Joseph and Eric Levenson, CNN
articles.title: Felony rioting charge against Kentucky's only Black female legislator has been dropped
articles.description: Felony rioting charges against Kentucky state Rep. Attica Scott and others arrested during Breonna Taylor protests in late September have been dropped, Scott confirmed to CNN.
